data.title: Technical Product Manager, Beta Systems IAM Software AG

description.en: Responsible for strategic product development and management of the 'Garancy' product family used for full-scale Identity and Access Management for enterprises in regulated industries

Owning product development (Scrum, Kanban) for four commercial products and one non-commercial product (partner enablement) with multiple cross-functional teams (design, frontend development, backend development QA, documentation)
Prioritizing the product backlog to align with strategic goals and ensuring efficient development cycles
Defining user stories, epics for release planning and product requirements documents for strategically important topics (Identity provider, Single sign-on, Multi-factor authentication, role mining)
Planning of strategic initiatives using STAR framework to implement product strategy & vision
Co-developing new product strategy and vision for the 'Garancy' product family and brand with executive management
Launching new product for role analysis to enable partners and consultants to implement Garancy solution faster
Prototyping internal tools for more efficient QA and documentation processes (SBOM, FOSS)
Presenting products for customers, partners and internal stakeholders in webinars, workshops, events and meetings

data.title: Software Engineer, Beta Systems DCI Software AG
data.description: Responsible for developing the product 'Beta Admin' used for document archiving, output management and log management

description.en: Planning, development and integration of software components and APIs in frontend (React.js, Redux, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3) in agile product team
Executing product roadmap in bi-weekly sprint cycles for the versions 5.2.0 to current by implementing user stories and addressing bugs
Refactoring of legacy codebase based on Clean Code patterns and principles
Setup of unit tests for legacy codebase (Jest, Jenkins) and acceptance tests for various operating systems (VirtualBox, Jenkins)
Setup and refactoring of Jenkins pipelines to execute CI/CD strategy for development and production environments

data.title: Full Stack Software Developer, ZeroWork GmbH (Startup, seed phase)
data.description: Responsible for planning and developing ZeroWork's marketplace and app

description.en: Planning, development and integration of software components and APIs in frontend (React.js, Redux, Material UI, HTML5, CSS3) and backend (Python, Django, PostgreSQL) in agile product team
Evaluation, validation and implementation of product roadmap for automation core (Playwright) to drive No-Code logic of app and marketplace
Migration of automation core codebase from Python to TypeScript
Integration of Stripe Payments into product ecosystem (app, marketplace, backend)
Integration of remote scheduler for app and marketplace (AWS, Redis)
Ownership and execution of Mac release process
Quality assurance and code reviews based on Clean Code patterns and principles

data.title: Software Engineer, ZkSystems GmbH (Startup, seed phase)
data.description: Responsible for planning and developing the app (cross-platform) and automation core for the ZeroWork.io launch

description.en: Planning, development and integration of software components and APIs in frontend (React.js, Redux, Material UI, HTML5, CSS3) in agile product team
Evaluation, validation and implementation of product roadmap for automation core as greenfield project (Python, Selenium, RPA Framework) to drive No-Code logic of app
Cross-platform development of core product (Electron.js, Node.js, Webpack)
Ownership and execution of Mac release process
Integration of on-premise and cloud queue management system for workflow execution in backend and app (AWS SQS, Redis, Bull)
Integration of logging and analytics in backend and frontend of the user journey (AWS S3, Mixpanel)
Quality assurance and code reviews based on Clean Code patterns and principles
Initial setup and implementation of unit tests within the software development lifecycle (GitLab CI, Git) to reach a test coverage of over 50%
Planning and validation of project 'ZeroWork.io'

data.title: Web Developer, auteon GmbH (Startup, PoC phase)
data.description: Responsible for planning and developing auteons article comparison mechanism via browser automation and supplier APIs

description.en: Planning, development and integration of software components and APIs in agile product development on strategic and operative level for backend
Testing, maintaining and optimizing existing software components to increase robustness, correctness and speed for core product
Coordination, support and code review for 3 working students within the automation team
Migration of monolithic legacy code to modular automation core with Clean Code approach

data.title: Technical Account Manager, Hilti AG
data.description: Responsible for 700+ industrial clients (SME) regarding consulting and direct sales in defined territory in Berlin area

description.en: Build, care and develop customer relations in accordance to company targets and cost efficient resourcing
Product presentation, delivering technical workshops and consulting customers with company's systematic sales approach
Qualitative and quantitive market research in cooperation with leadership team and technical task force to address market opportunity

Admission to Hilti's Top Club Germany by the general management for exceeding strategic company targets for 2 consecutive years based on customer loyalty, revenue growth and execution of companys long-term growth initiatives

data.summary: Technical Product Manager with an engineering background who likes to build excellent software with great people. My mission is to help purposeful tech companies realize their vision of the future by working pragmatically, thoroughly and business-oriented.
